short_summary: Window Replacement Design at Wabush Air Terminal Building
description: PSPC on behalf of Transport Canada has a requirement for the design of the replacement of windows and repairs to the building envelope at the Wabush Air Terminal Building (ATB) in Wabush, NL.
full_summary:
=====================================

**Request for Proposal (RFP) - Window Replacement Design at Wabush Air Terminal Building**

**Reference Number:** WS4611598228-SOL467890567
**Publication Date:** June 11, 2024
**Closing Date:** June 27, 2024, at 14:00:00

**Project Description**

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), on behalf of Transport Canada, invites proposals for the design of the replacement of windows and repairs to the building envelope at the Wabush Air Terminal Building in Wabush, Newfoundland and Labrador.

**Supply Arrangement**

This RFP is issued against Supply Arrangement E0225-152290 for Architecture and Interior Design Services. The solicited firms are Turner Fleischer Architects Inc., Root Architecture Inc., Lydon Lynch Architects Ltd., Architecture 49 Inc., DRKR Ltd., and Gibbons Snow Architects Inc.

**Notice Type**

This is a competitive bidding process with a selective tendering method.

**Selection Criteria**

The selection will be based on a combined rating of technical merit and price.

**Trade Agreements**

The contract is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement

**Contracting Entity Information**

Contracting Entity Name: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada
Contact Person: Rachel Miller
Contact Email: rachel.miller@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

**Notice URL**

No notice URL is provided.

**Proposal Submission**

Proposals may be submitted in either official language of Canada (English or French). The RFP issuing office provides services in English.

**Submission Information**

Bidders should refer to the solicitation for further details.

**Important Dates**

* Closing Date: June 27, 2024, at 14:00:00
* Expected Contract Start Date: June 21, 2024
* Expected Contract End Date: None
